meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seductive.
meanings.sent1: Her seductiveness was undeniable, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The actress's seductiveness on screen captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's seductiveness towards the laser pointer was both amusing and puzzling.
meanings.sent4: The seductiveness of the forbidden fruit tempted Adam and Eve.
meanings.sent5: The seductiveness of the mysterious stranger lingered in her mind long after their encounter.

meanings.definition: The power to entice or attract someone.
meanings.sent1: The perfume's seductiveness made it a bestseller.
meanings.sent2: His natural charm and seductiveness made him popular among his peers.
meanings.sent3: The car salesman's exaggerated seductiveness in his pitch made customers chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The seductiveness of the music lured people to the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The seductiveness of the advertisement convinced many to try the new product.
